actions.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Governmental Affairs. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Thompson. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 31.
By Senator Thompson from Committee on Governmental Affairs filed written report. Report No. 106-15. Minority views filed.

official_title: An original bill to prevent the shutdown of the Government at the beginning of a fiscal year if a new budget is not yet enacted.

summary.text: Government Shutdown Prevention Act - Provides for continuing appropriations at the beginning of a fiscal year if any regular appropriations bill does not become law prior to such time.

titles.title: An original bill to prevent the shutdown of the Government at the beginning of a fiscal year if a new budget is not yet enacted.
